H0.text: The name of which musical instrument comes from the German for bells and play. Carillon

H1.text: The name of which musical instrument comes from the German for bells and play. Handbell

H2.text: The name of which musical instrument comes from the German for bells and play. Dulcimer

H3.text: The name of which musical instrument comes from the German for bells and play. GLOCKENSPIEL

A4.text: Glockenspiel ( GLO-kən-shpeel; German pronunciation: [ˈɡlɔkənˌʃpiːl] or [ˈɡlɔkn̩ˌʃpiːl], Glocken: bells and Spiel: play)

A5.text: In German, a carillon is also called a Glockenspiel
